ygData.msgSnippet: Icedeamon might have been behing Shocker s shield, but Blue Reeker was practically hanging on him, I think. ... Zardus lands near the base, looking behind him

Icedeamon might have been behing Shocker's shield, but Blue Reeker was 
practically hanging on him, I think.

::Zardus::

Zardus lands near the base, looking behind him at the others coming up. He 
realizes that they had left Zergling back on the battlefield.

"Perndabot, please go get Zergling?" Zardus says, politely but in a deadly 
tone.

Perndabot nods. "Yes, Zardus." He says and runs back toward the 
ex-battlefield.

Zardus walks into the base and to the bridge, ordering the computer to 
recognize Blue Reeker as an alliance member.
